translations.text: and penetrating into the heart of enemy lines!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Surely humankind is ungrateful to their Lord—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and they certainly attest to this—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and they are truly extreme in their love of ˹worldly˺ gains.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ

translations.text: Do they not know that when the contents of the graves will be spilled out,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afala yaAAlamu itha buAAthira mafee alquboor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and the secrets of the hearts will be laid bare—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: surely their Lord is All-Aware of them on that Day.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
